title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2ยง 16.5 - Exchange of surplus farm products
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2ยง 16.5 - Exchange of surplus farm products

State Regulations
(a) Surplus farm products and farm animals, produced on any of the institutional farms, or at any agricultural school or
agricultural experiment station, which are not required by the institution that
produced them, may be transferred in the manner prescribed by section 177 of
the State Finance Law. (b) Each
institution and the Commissioner of Agriculture and Markets shall keep a
complete record of such transfers which shall state the products, prices, amounts and such other data as may be required. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2ยง
16.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
